import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {NgbDropdownConfig} from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dropdown', templateUrl: './dropdown.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dropdown.component.scss'], providers: [NgbDropdownConfig] // add NgbDropdownConfig to the component providers }) export class DropdownComponent implements OnInit { constructor(config: NgbDropdownConfig) { // customize default values of dropdowns used by this component tree config.placement = 'top-left'; config.autoClose = false; } ngOnInit() { } }
